content.title: Green and Eco-Friendly Measures
content.details: 'Green and Eco-Friendly Measures' under 'Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Industries - State Awards to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises' is a scheme by the Industries and Commerce Department, Union Territory of Puducherry. The award is conferred upon the industries that are green and eco-friendly as per the standards of the Department of Science, Technology and Environment (DSTE), Puducherry. The awardee is given a cash award of ₹2,00,000/- and a citation. The applications are accepted offline in the prescribed form available on the Official Website of the Department.
eligibility: The industry should be green and eco-friendly as per the DSTE standards.
The unit should provide at least 60% of employment to the people of UT of Puducherry of the total employment strength of the industrial units.
content.application_process: Offline. The Director of Industries will invite the application for award by wide publicity. The industrial unit should apply for the award in the prescribed form available on the Official Website of the Directorate of Industries and Commerce, Puducherry. The application form must be filled in with all mandatory fields, and copies of all mandatory documents should be attached (self-attest, if required). The unit should submit the duly filled and signed application form and the documents to the concerned authority either in person or by post.
documents_required: Certification from the Department of Science, Technology and Environment (DSTE), Puducherry for Zero/Minimum Effluent Discharge.
Entrepreneurs Memorandum Part-2 (UAM/ PMT) Registration/ Commencement of Production Certificate.
Any other document, as required by the Award Committee.

faqs.question: What are the criteria for industries to qualify for the cash award and citation under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Industries must meet the green and eco-friendly standards set by the Department of Science, Technology and Environment (DSTE), Puducherry, and provide at least 60% of employment to residents of Puducherry.

faqs.question: What benefits do industries receive upon being awarded under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Awardees receive a cash prize of ₹2,00,000/- and a citation, recognizing their efforts in adopting green and eco-friendly measures in their operations.

faqs.question: Can you provide insight into the application process for industries interested in applying for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Interested industries can obtain the prescribed application form from the official website of the Industries and Commerce Department, Union Territory of Puducherry, and submit it offline along with the required documents.

faqs.question: What role does the Department of Science, Technology and Environment (DSTE), Puducherry, play in the scheme?
faqs.answer: The DSTE plays a crucial role in certifying industries for their zero or minimum effluent discharge, ensuring compliance with environmental standards.

faqs.question: Are there any specific documents that industries need to submit along with their application?
faqs.answer: Industries are required to submit certification from the DSTE for zero or minimum effluent discharge, Entrepreneurs Memorandum Part-2 (UAM/PMT) Registration/Commencement of Production Certificate, and any other documents as required by the Award Committee.

faqs.question: Can industries from all sectors apply for the scheme, or are there specific sectors targeted?
faqs.answer: Industries from all sectors are eligible to apply as long as they meet the criteria of being green and eco-friendly according to the standards set by the DSTE.

faqs.question: What categories of awards are provided under 'Motivation of Entrepreneurs to Start Industries and Fiscal Assistance to Industries - State Awards to Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises'?
faqs.answer: Awards are given in categories such as Outstanding Entrepreneur, Outstanding SC/ST Entrepreneur, Innovation in Technology (Product or Process), Outstanding Exporter, and Outstanding Artisan of the Year.

faqs.question: What are the financial benefits provided under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Recipients of the awards are granted a cash award of ₹2,00,000/- along with a citation.

faqs.question: Who constitutes the Committee responsible for granting these awards?
faqs.answer: The Committee consists of the Director of Industries and Commerce, Puducherry as Chairman, along with members from various departments such as DSTE, Finance, District Industries Centre, and Directorate of Industries and Commerce.

faqs.question: What is the role of the Committee in the awarding process?
faqs.answer: The Committee evaluates the merits of each case for the grant of the award and makes final decisions regarding the awards.

faqs.question: Are there any conditions for eligibility to receive these awards?
faqs.answer: Yes, one of the conditions is that the industrial unit must provide at least 60% of employment to the people of the Union territory of Puducherry out of its total employment strength.

faqs.question: How are the selected enterprises notified about their eligibility for the awards?
faqs.answer: The Director of Industries notifies and informs the selected enterprises about their eligibility to receive the awards.
